<title level="1" right="Rules">[Progression](/Rules.aspx?ID=1965)</title>

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 186 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
A blighted boon grows in potency within the user's body, progressing in stages. While in any stage from a blighted boon, the [partaker](/Rules.aspx?ID=1964) is temporarily immune to other versions of the same blighted boon. Unless the boon's description says otherwise, the effects of each stage combine, often growing stronger over time.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
